title: Select your platform for Grafana Alloy

blocks.content: In this milestone, you navigate to the MySQL integration page in Grafana Cloud and select your platform environment.
Click **Connections > Add new connection** in the left-side menu.
Search for **MySQL** in the search field and click the **MySQL** integration tile to select it.
Select the **operating system** that matches your platform.
blocks.tooltip: Select your operating system (Linux, macOS, Windows, or Kubernetes).

blocks.content: Select the **architecture** that matches your system.
blocks.tooltip: Select Amd64 for x86_64 systems or Arm64 for aarch64 systems.

blocks.content: If you are unsure of the architecture, run `uname -m` in your terminal. If it returns `x86_64`, select **Amd64**. If it returns `aarch64`, select **Arm64**.
